megadatamod.name: Mega Data Mod

megahintmod.name: Mega Hint Mod
megahintmod.desc: At the start of a battle, gives each player information about the potential Mega in their party

sametypeclause.name: Same Type Clause
sametypeclause.desc: Forces all Pokémon on a team to share a type with each other
